casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Gregory Requint ARTIS. No. 17P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Southern Pines, for Gregory Requint Artis. Dahr Joseph Tanoury, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 641 S.E.2d 314 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th day of March 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th day of June 2007."
